License Types

By purchasing and downloading WICKEDTEMPLATES templates you are being granted a license to use the files for specific uses under certain conditions.

Personal License

Personal License allows you to use downloaded templates for non-commercial, personal projects, personal social media accounts, and personal physical items not for sale. Also, you can use assets with a personal license to any project that doesn’t bring you a profit. This type of license included in Commercial and Extended licenses.

Comercial License

Commercial License allows you to use downloaded assets for commercial projects which involve customer orders, revenue-generating projects, end-products for sale, physical or digital advertising, physical items not for sale. This type of license is included in an Extended license.

Extended License

Extended License allows you to use downloaded assets to create end products for sale. You can modify or manipulate the product. You can combine the product with other works and make a derivative work from it.

Free License

Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0 International (CC BY-SA 4.0). Read more

You are free to:

Share — copy and redistribute the material in any medium or format.

Adapt — remix, transform, and build upon the material for any purpose, even commercially.

The licensor cannot revoke these freedoms as long as you follow the license terms.

Under the following terms:

Attribution — You must give appropriate credit, provide a link to the license, and indicate if changes were made. You may do so in any reasonable manner, but not in any way that suggests the licensor endorses you or your use.

ShareAlike —If you remix, transform, or build upon the material, you must distribute your contributions under the same license as the original.

No additional restrictions —You may not apply legal terms or technological measure that legally restrict others from doing anything the license permits.

Notices

You do not have to comply with the license for elements of the material in the public domain or where your use is permitted by an applicable exception or limitation.

No warranties are given. The license may not give you all of the permissions necessary for your intended use. For example, other rights such as publicity, privacy, or moral rights may limit how you use the material.

Demo Files

Demo files of the products are available for personal use only.

General terms of License

You may modify the resources according to your requirements and use them royalty free in any or all of your personal and commercial projects. For example, you may use this resource for a client.

WICKEDTEMPLATES will not be responsible for any outcome that may occur during the course of usage of WICKEDTEMPLATES resources.

You are not required to attribute or link to WICKEDTEMPLATES in any of the projects you create using WICKEDTEMPLATES products.

Copyright

Even if you’re able to resell any of WICKEDTEMPLATES products under an Extended license, you’re not able to assign the authorship as your own. You only get the license that allows you to use the asset only in specified in this license agreement terms.

Prohibitions

You do not have the right to redistribute, resell, lease, license, sub-license WICKEDTEMPLATES products.

You are not allowed to offer the file downloaded to any third party. If you are creating end-products for sale or for free distributing, they shouldn’t include editable source files of WICKEDTEMPLATES products.

For any resalable web applications or software programs, you should not include WICKEDTEMPLATES templates as an additional attachment. This will be considered as a redistribution of WICKEDTEMPLATES resources which is forbidden.

You are not allowed to permit an end-user of the End Product to extract the Item and use it separately from the End Product.

If WICKEDTEMPLATES suspects you do not comply with this agreement and the terms of using WICKEDTEMPLATES service, WICKEDTEMPLATES have the right to block your account and close access to the products without a refund and clarification of the circumstances.

Changes

WICKEDTEMPLATES reserve the right, at WICKEDTEMPLATES sole discretion, to modify or replace the License Terms at any time. The changes to the License will start to affect since your next subscription period.

WICKEDTEMPLATESreserve the right to change prices and revise the resources usage policy at any moment without reason explanation.
